posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

5/02/22 - 5/08/22
Issue - V101
Current Release: 1.9.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Updates

  • Congrats on 100 weekly roundups of amazing community content!
  • Check out how Mitchell and Roland visualized their research with Rascore, an app for analyzing the 3D structural models of RAS proteins.

Featured Content

  • ChemPlot : Chemical Space Visualization @dajtmullaj
  • Wind Simulation - Request Offer
  • Depth-aware text addition

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Debugging Streamlit application in VSCode. Part -5
  • Create a Simple Language Learning App Using Streamlit
  • Deploy Streamlit on Replit
  • Customizing Streamlit Columns
  • Primeros Pasos con Streamlit: Los pingüinos de Palmer

  • Streamlit学習の開始
  • Google OAuth + Streamlit application. Part - 6
  • Развертываем Streamlit приложение на платформе Heroku | Инженерия искусственного интеллекта
  • Streamlit学習 表データの表示２
  • StreamlitアプリをDockerでAWSにデプロイする
  • Streamlit学習 Media elements
  • Streamlit学習 Draw charts and maps
  • python Streamlit学習 Layout

NLP and Language

  • Sentiment Analysis
  • Javascript Wizard
  • Tweetlit
  • rongzi/榕子
  • Youtube Summarizer
  • People’s Thoughts Demo

Data Visualization

  • Matplotlib Graph Builder GUI
  • Data Visualization Project using Streamlit
  • Data Visualization With Streamlit Python
  • DEMO APPLICATION ANALYSE DE DONNEES AVEC STREAMLIT PYTHON

CV and Images

  • Taller Inteligencia Artificial, NLP, SpaCy, Jupyter y Streamlit, todos juntos! Upcoming workshop 5/24/22
